message.content:
cs.DM, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.CC, cs.GT

Reasoning: The paper deals with optimization problems on binary matrices and directed acyclic graphs, which are topics commonly studied in discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The problem of constructing a perfect phylogeny is a topic in computational biology, which falls under the category of computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also discusses approximation algorithms and hardness results, which are topics in computational complexity (cs.CC) and graph theory (cs.GT).
